titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: Membership card for Mme de la Forest s4: <*> (Nov 22) = "7 os"?

body.ab:
"SHAKESPEARE AND COMPANY" -SYLVIA BEACH- 12. RUE DE L'OD´EON - PARIS VIe LENDING LIBRARY CARD OF MEMBERSHIP
Madame André de la Forest-Divonne 86 rue de Maistre 18e Nov 4, 1938 - May 4, 1939
DEPOSIT: fifty francs This card must be kept as receipt for the deposit E.W.O.
Renewed:
1937 de la FOREST-DIVONNE Comtesse André 86 rue de Maistre 18e
1 m 2 vols 45 fr dep (will pay) pd 5 bal Nov 29 pd dep 95 ref dep 100v March 26 Nov 22 Wuthering Heights Nov 29 On a Chinese Screen Nov 29 29 Essex. Dec 10 29 Point Counterpoint Dec 10 Dec 10 Henry the Eighth, Hackett Jan. 25. Jacob's Room Dec 24 Dec 24 Renewed December 22 1937 January 22 1938 (left dep. for 1 vol 25 frs 2 vols) Renewed. Jan. 22 - February 22 1938. 45 frn Jan. 25 Of Human bondage Febr. 2 25 Venetian blinds Febr. 15. Febr. 2. Magic Island Febr. 5 Febr. 5 Garden Party Febr. 5 Febr. 16 Note in Music March 2 Febr. 16 Breakfast in Bed. March 2 Renewed February 22 - March 22 1938 40v
March 2 Invitation to the Waltz 15 2 Painted Veil 15 15 Burmese Days March 26 15 From Anne to Victoria March 26
Subscription renewed 6m 1vol B 180v deposit 50v Nov 4 - May 4, 1939 Nov 4 Precious Bane 15 4 Weather in the Streets 15 15 Gone To Earth Nov 23 15 Dusty Answer " Nov 22 Passage to India Dec 13 " <*> a Secret Dec 13 Dec 13 Enchanter's Nightshade Jan 17 13 Jalna Dec 27 27 Whiteoaks of Jalna Jan 17 Jan 17 Young Renny Jan 24 Jan 17 Peking Picnic Jan 27 24 Finch's High Fortune Feb 1 27 Master of Jalna Feb 8 Feb 1 Whiteoak Harvest Feb 8 Feb 8 Heaven's My Destination Feb 23 8 Dark Island 23 23 All Passion Spent 28 23 Constant Nymph 28 28 Fool in the Family Apr 5
